error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url::fromUri() instead.
Call to deprecated function valid_email_address(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('email.validator')->isValid().
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to slack_invite.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
